thread.title: Republican Party tweets fake quote from Abraham Lincoln | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Republican Party tweets fake quote from Abraham Lincoln | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Republican Party tweets fake quote from Abraham Lincoln | Daily Mail Online
text: Republican Party's official Twitter account is celebrating Abraham Lincoln’s birthday with a FAKE quote Republican Party posted quote in celebration of Abraham Lincoln's birthday 'And in the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years' They attributed quote to Lincoln, but there's no substantive evidence he said it Quote's first appearance came about in 1947 for the advertisement of a book It was attributed to Edward J. Stieglitz, M.D., who wrote The Second Forty Years Published: 23:29 GMT, 12 February 2017 | Updated: 23:41 GMT, 12 February 2017 59 shares
